v0.0.10-preview.description:
# !!! THIS VERSION IS BROKEN !!!
Please use the [v0.0.10-preview-hotfix](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/tag/v0.0.10-preview-hotfix) instead.
v0.0.10-preview.title: v0.0.10-preview

v0.0.10-preview-hotfix.description:
## Hotfix
- This is a hotfix for [v0.0.10-preview](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/tag/v0.0.10-preview) that fixes a game-breaking issue with random card generation, making it not possible to draw cards from some packs and not craft some items.

# !!! THIS IS A PREVIEW AND MAY NOT BE STABLE !!!
This release has new features and fixes that I have **_not yet been able to properly test_**, so any support with testing and feedback on this would be very helpful and appreciated, if at all possible!

## New Feature(s)
**Trap Items** are supported, currently including two traps:
  - `Get Gooped!`
  - `Get Pooped!` 

Both of the above will spawn 20 of each item randomly across the board. It's more of a nuisance trap at the moment, but with vision to include Enemy Spawn traps in future.

**_NOTE_**: Trap items can be toggled on/off with `include_traps` in the `.yaml` if you don't want them.

## Changes
- The following Location Checks have been **_removed_**, as they are not Mainland quests so did not actually trigger:
  - `Build a Garden`
  - `Build a Mine`
  - `Build a Sawmill`
  - `Build a Smithy`
- The following Location Checks have been **_added_** as they are achievable on Mainland _(only filler items will be placed in them due to how RNG-based fulfilling these quests are!)_:
  - `Train an Archer`
  - `Equip an Archer with a Quiver`
- The following Items have been **_added_** to the item pool:
  - `Idea: Charcoal` _(useful)_
  - `Apple Tree x3` _(filler)_
  - `Berry x5` _(filler)_
  - `Coin x5`, `Coin x10`, `Coin x25` _(filler)_
  - `Egg x5` _(filler)_
  - `Iron Deposit x3` _(filler)_
  - `Milk x5` _(filler)_
  - `Stick x5` _(filler)_
  - `Tree x3` _(filler)_
- "Basic Items" list has been expanded to provide a better variety of possible items that will replace randomly spawning ideas _(such as from the `Old Tome`)_
- Card-blocking logic should no longer prevent `Island` ideas from spawning if your goal is set to `Kill the Demon Lord`. Although The Island isn't actually supported yet, it might now make this achievable. However, it will mean half of your run has no checks so I would probably still avoid this goal for now.
- Selected goal from the yaml is now no longer treated as a location check in the check pool.

## Fixes
- DeathLink should no longer always think it is not enabled, despite the yaml config.
- DeathLink tag should not be included twice.

## Important
To ensure that this mod works as expected, please make sure to only use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release.

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)
v0.0.10-preview-hotfix.title: v0.0.10-preview-hotfix

v0.0.11.description:
## Changes
- `Idea: Resource Magnet` has been removed from the item pool as this cannot be crafted with Mainland-only items.
- `Idea: Mess Hall` has been re-added to the item pool as this can be crafted with Mainland-only items.

## Fixes
- `Graveyard` can now be crafted with 2x `Corpse` cards again.
- Booster Packs should no longer unlock a small selection of ideas before having received them from checks.
- Villagers dying _(not from DeathLink)_ should no longer display as **Misc_Clone(Type)** on in-game notifications.
- Trap items _(if enabled in `.yaml`)_ should now spawn correctly when received from checks.

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)

_**To ensure that this mod works as expected, please make sure to only use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release. It may not function as expected if you do not use all the binaries together from this release.**_
v0.0.11.title: v0.0.11

v0.0.12.description:
# PLEASE USE [v0.0.12-hotfix](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/tag/v0.0.12-hotfix)
This release has an issue that causes received DeathLinks to not trigger correctly - this has been fixed in the hotfix release.

## Fixes
- `Catacombs` and `Forest` should now drop items correctly.
- `Unlock all Packs` quest reinstated as a location check and should now trigger when all Mainland boosters have been unlocked.
- Enemies should no longer drop Equipment Ideas that would otherwise have been received as items from checks _(they can still drop the equipment items, just not the ideas along with them)_
- The `New Weaponry` booster pack should no longer spawn which was previously giving Equipment Ideas far too early.
- In-game 'Goal Completed' notification should now appear when the goal has been completed.
- Booster Pack details should no longer rapidly change when hovered over.
- DeathLinks received from other players during a cutscene should now wait for the cutscene to finish before killing a villager - this should prevent the game state getting confused and preventing the player from being able to do anything.

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)

_**To ensure that this mod works as expected, please make sure to only use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release. It may not function as expected if you do not use all the binaries together from this release.**_
v0.0.12.title: v0.0.12

v0.0.12-hotfix.description:
## Fixes
- Fixes an issue in [v0.0.12](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/tag/v0.0.12) that was causing received DeathLinks not to trigger.

## !!! IMPORTANT !!!
Does not currently support The Island so setting the goal to `Kill the Demon Lord` will be unachievable - please do not use this setting.

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)

_**To ensure that this mod works as expected, please make sure to only use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release. It may not function as expected if you do not use all the binaries together from this release.**_
v0.0.12-hotfix.title: v0.0.12-hotfix

v0.0.3.description:
## Functionality Changes
- Game Save data is now automatically created / loaded on successful connection to an Archipelago server.
  - Game saves are created / loaded per seed and will automatically load on successful connection to a server.
  - You no longer need to clear save data to when beginning a new run - just connect and play as normal!

- Complete re-work of rules in `.apworld` in an attempt to better balance run progression.

## YAML Option Changes
New configurable options now available via YAML configuration: 

- **DeathLink Support** 
  - DeathLinks received will kill a random villager, DeathLinks will be sent when a villager dies.
  - Set `death_link: true` to enable DeathLink or `death_link: false` to disable.

- **Enable Pausing**
  - Allow / Prevent the ability to manually pause time during the run.
  - Set `pause_enabled: true` to allow pausing, set `pause_enabled: false` to disable pausing.

- **Start With Basic Pack**
  - Balances early-game progression - if a basic pack is not unlocked before the end of Moon 2, your run is guaranteed to fail from starvation.
  - Set `basic_pack: true` to start with the Humble Beginnings pack, set `basic_pack: false` to start with no packs.

## How to Install to Stacklands
1. Download `StacklandsRandomizer v0.0.3.zip`.
2. Extract the contents of the `.zip` file to: `%LocalAppData%low\sokpop\Mods`
3. Start the Game
4. From the Main Menu, go to `Mods -> Stacklands Randomizer`
5. Enter the server name (including port), the Slot Name and the password (if required)
6. Click 'Connect' - the game will quickly restart.
7. If successful, the main menu box should now display `Archipelago: Connected`
8. Start a new run
v0.0.3.title: v0.0.3

v0.0.4.description:
## Fixes
- `stacklands.apworld` updated to fix WebWorld instantiation error and location duplication error which was causing generations to fail.
- Updated `Stacklands.yaml` with a generated template
v0.0.4.title: v0.0.4

3. Start the Game
4. From the Main Menu, go to `Mods -> Stacklands Randomizer`
5. Enter the server name (including port), the Slot Name and the password (if required)
6. Click 'Connect' - the game will quickly restart.
7. If successful, the main menu box should now display `Archipelago: Connected`
8. Start a new run

v0.0.5-hotfix.description:
## Bugfix
- Booster packs should now show as unlocked when continuing an existing game.
- Debug log no longer continuously prints when the game is paused

## How to Install Mod to Stacklands
1. Download `StacklandsRandomizer v0.0.5.zip`.
2. Extract the contents of the `.zip` file to: `%LocalAppData%low\sokpop\Mods`
3. Start the Game
4. From the Main Menu, go to `Mods -> Stacklands Randomizer`
5. Enter the server name (including port), the Slot Name and the password (if required)
6. Click 'Connect' - the game will quickly restart.
7. If successful, the main menu box should now display `Archipelago: Connected`
8. Start a new run
v0.0.5-hotfix.title: v0.0.5-hotfix

v0.0.6.description:
## Important
- Upgrading to this version and continuing a run that was started with `v0.0.5-hotfix` or lower will likely cause all blueprints and resource packs to respawn the first time it’s loaded - it should be fine after that.

## Changes
- Item handling has been re-worked. _(This will likely have no impact on your experience, but rest assured the back-end is now much nicer)_
- Received items from the server are now stored in the game save to better keep track of progress.
- In-game notifications have been re-worded and provide a bit more information about how the item was received.

## Bugfixes
- The `Idea: Spear` and `Idea: Hotpot` items are now mapped correctly.
- The `Flint x5` item now contains 5 Flint instead of 4.
- The `Kill the Demon Lord` location should now no longer be included if the goal (in the `.yaml`) has been set to `Kill the Demon`.
  - _**NOTE:** I think the `Kill the Demon Lord` goal is currently unachievable, so I would probably stick with `Kill the Demon` for now._

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)
v0.0.6.title: v0.0.6

v0.0.7.description:
## Fixes
- `Graveyard` should now be craftable with `2x Corpse` cards _before_ having discovered it in the `Explorers Booster Pack`.
- Applied a failsafe to prevent items received while offline from not appearing when continuing a game.
  - _If this issue persists, disconnecting and reconnecting from the `Mods` menu or restarting the game should resolve it. However, this may indicate an issue with either the AP Server or the AP MultiClient library that I will be unable to address.)_

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)
v0.0.7.title: v0.0.7

v0.0.8.description:
## Fixes
- Multiple quests triggering at the same time should no longer prevent these checks from being sent to the server.
- `Idea: Cooked Meat`, `Idea: Frittata` and `Idea: Omelette` have now been included as progressive items in the item pool, allowing you to actually cook them and get these checks... 🤦‍♂️

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)
v0.0.8.title: v0.0.8

v0.0.9.description:
## Changes
Rules have been completely re-worked and improved to better balance the progression. The `Kill the Demon` goal is now classed as 'logically reachable' when the player has _all_ of the following:
- Ability to create `House` and `Offspring`
- Ability to create `Iron Bar` and `Smelter` _(which subsequently include needing `Plank` and `Brick`)_
- Ability to perform `Growth` and build a `Shed` and a `Garden`
- Ability to create a `Campfire` and `Cook Raw Meat`
- Ability to `Train Militia`, `Train a Wizard`
- Able to find the `Golden Goblet`

You are able to skip some of this logic in cases where you receive RNG dropped items like `Plank`, `Brick`, `Iron Bar` etc, but these rules are a good starting point to pave a playable progression so you don't get too stuck.

Other changes:
- `basic_pack` option in YAML is **no longer supported**, as the above changes help balance the progression so you _should_ always receive the `Humble Beginnings Booster Pack` very early on without getting stuck.
- `start_inventory` option in YAML is now supported, so if you would like to always begin with `Humble Beginnings Booster Pack` _(or any other item, for that matter)_ then include it here:
```
start_inventory:
{
    'Humble Beginnings Booster Pack': 1,
    'Other Item Name Here': 1,
    etc...
}
```

## Fixes
- `Old Tome` item can now no longer spawn `Idea: ` items.

## Important
To ensure that this mod works as expected, please make sure to only use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release.

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)
v0.0.9.title: v0.0.9

v0.1.0-alpha.description:
# !!! THIS IS AN ALPHA BUILD !!!
This release needs playtesting and therefore _**may be unstable**_. If you experience issues please report them [here](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/issues).  
If you are not prepared to playtest or would prefer to use the most stable version, please use the [v.0.0.12-hotfix](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/tag/v0.0.12-hotfix) release.

**PLEASE NOTE:** The `apworld` for this version will not work as intended if used with a previous version of the mod - please ensure you do not mix versions of the `apworld` and the `.zip` files.

## Updates
- Now supports `The Dark Forest`.
  - Will add checks for each of the five quests in The Dark Forest.
  - This can be toggled with the `dark_forest` setting in the YAML options.
- Now supports `Kill the Wicked Witch` as the goal.
  - Will require the player to kill the Wicked Witch to complete the goal.
  - If `dark_forest` is disabled, this goal will still work but the run will not include any other checks for The Dark Forest.
  - This can be configured by setting the `goal` YAML option to `kill_the_wicked_witch`.
- Now supports `Mobsanity`.
  - Will add a `"Kill a XXXXX"` check for each enemy type that can be reached.
  - Will not include enemies that can only be found in The Dark Forest if `dark_forest` is not enabled in the YAML.
  - This can be toggled with the `mobsanity` setting in the YAML options.
- Complete re-write of the ruleset _(again!)_ to help better balance the progression order of items.
- Nerfed some of the resource filler items as they were providing players with too much free gold.
- Removed `Get Pooped!` trap item as players can gain 20 gold from it, making the trap seem advantageous.

## Known Issues
- If duplicate filler items are in the item pool, only the first of the duplicates received will spawn _(issue #50)_

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)

_**To ensure that this mod works as expected, please make sure to only use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release. It may not function as expected if you do not use all the binaries together from this release.**_
v0.1.0-alpha.title: v0.1.0-alpha

v0.1.1-alpha.description:
# !!! THIS IS AN ALPHA BUILD !!!
This release needs playtesting and therefore _**may be unstable**_. If you experience issues please report them [here](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/issues).  
If you are not prepared to playtest or would prefer to use the most stable version, please use the [v.0.0.12-hotfix](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/tag/v0.0.12-hotfix) release.

**PLEASE NOTE:** The `apworld` for this version will not work as intended if used with a previous version of the mod - please ensure you do not mix versions of the `apworld` and the `.zip` files.

## Updates
- In-game quest log should now always display all relevant location check quests for your run, based on your YAML configuration.
- When continuing / restarting a run, any received `Idea` items should now spawn in a stack.
- Additional `Trap` items added:
  - `Chickens` and `Rabbits` traps will spawn 5 of the specified 'Trap [Animal]'. They will move around the board quicker than usual, drop no resources while alive and drop no items when killed.
  - `Rat`, `Slime` and `Snake` traps will spawn one of the specified 'Trap [Enemy]'. They will have the same stats as usual, drop no items when killed and **_will not_** complete relevant Mobsanity quests when killed.
- Trap items will only spawn when received from a check while you are actively playing in a connected session. This is to prevent continuing/restarting a run and getting flooded with all previously received traps, making it impossible to continue.

## Fixes
- Duplicate filler "junk" items should now be received correctly. _(Fixes issue #50)_

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)

_**To ensure that this mod works as expected, please make sure to only use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release. It may not function as expected if you do not use all the binaries together from this release.**_
v0.1.1-alpha.title: v0.1.1-alpha

v0.1.4-alpha-fix.description:
_**EDIT:** This release has been updated on `14th July 2025` with a fix to the mod - if you installed `v0.1.4-alpha-fix` prior to this date, you will need to re-download the `.zip` file and overwrite your existing mod._

## Patch Notes
### Mod
- Fixes an issue causing `Have X Food` and `Have X Coins` quests from completing their location checks.
### APWorld
- Fixes an issue when generating a seed that caused 'unplaced items' warnings.
- Fixes an issue causing the `items != locations count` apworld unit test to fail.
- Fixes an issue causing the `group contains no items` apworld unit test to fail.
- Added unit tests for better apworld testing.
- Slight tweak to the priority of a few location checks for _(hopefully)_ slightly better balancing.

## Known Issues
- All currently known issues can be found in [open issues](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen) - please take time to read these to see how your experience may be affected.

_**PLEASE NOTE:** To ensure that this mod works as expected, please **only** use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release, otherwise it may not function as expected._

v0.1.5-pre-release.description:
This version is not an official release as it is an **_attempt_** at fixing issue #57 

## Patch Notes
- Adjustments made to help prevent main menu from crashing after the game reboots when connecting to a server.
- Connected status element has now been moved to a box at the top-centre of the screen so is visible at all times. 
- On disconnect while playing, connection status element at the top should change status with a reason for the disconnect and a notification will also appear.

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/blob/main/README.md)

_**PLEASE NOTE:** To ensure that this mod works as expected, please **only** use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release, otherwise it may not function as expected._
v0.1.5-pre-release.title: v0.1.5-pre-release

v0.1.6-alphar2.description:
## Information
_**EDIT:** The `.apworld` for this release has been replaced with an updated version as of `23:25 (UTC+1) on Sunday 27th July`. If you installed the apworld for this mod prior to then, please update your `.apworld` file to the version now attached in this release. It fixes an issue causing generations to fail._

This mod is currently in alpha, so it is possible that it may contain bugs or issues - please familiarise yourself with the [known issues list](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen) before using this mod to see how your experience may be affected.

If you experience a bug/issue that is _not_ in the list, please raise a new github issue or post it in the [Stacklands Forum in the Archipelago Discord Server](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1151149079238299719)

_**PLEASE NOTE:** To ensure that this mod works as intended, please **only** use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release._

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-mod-to-stacklands)

## Patch Notes
### APWorld / YAML Updates
- Added `all_bosses` to the `goal` option to support killing _both_ **Demon** and **Wicked Witch** as your goal.
- `dark_forest` option removed and replaced with `quest_checks` option to select the quests from each board to include as checks.
- `board_expansion_mode` option added:
  - Set to `ideas` for **Idea: Shed** and **Idea: Warehouse** to be added to the item pool so you can build and expand the board as you please.
  - Set to `items` to add **Board Expansion** items to the item pool.
    - Total in pool can be configured with `board_expansion_count` option
    - Amount each item expands card limit and board size by can be configured with `board_expansion_amount` option
- `moon_length` option added:
  - Set to `short`, `normal` or `long` to set moon length as per the normal vanilla settings.
- `trap_fill` option added to set percentage of filler item pool that will contain **Trap** items
- Reworked **Filler** items:
  - All filler ideas remain as they are, but are now not prioritised to fill the pool.
  - All filler 'resource bundles' have been removed and been replaced with **Resource Booster Pack** item.
    - Will spawn a new **Resource Booster** pack to the current board. It will randomly draw one structure, two food and two resource cards with varying probabilities / values
  - The apworld will now generate a random amount of idea filler items to include and then fill the remaining gaps with **Resource Booster Pack** items, to help add a bit of variety to runs rather than _always_ receiving the same set of filler ideas.
- New / Reworked **Trap** items:
  - **Feed Villagers Trap** will force the feed villagers phase immediately.
    - Weighting of these traps in the trap pool can be configured with the `feed_villagers_trap_weighting` option.
  - **Mob Trap** will spawn a random, basic level enemy.
      - These enemies _will not_ trigger Mobsanity checks when killed.
      - Weighting of these traps in the trap pool can be configured with the `mob_trap_weighting` option.
  - **Sell Cards Trap** will force the player to sell **X** amount of cards immediately.
    - Amount of cards to be sold can be configured with `sell_cards_trap_amount` option
    - If you do not have **X** amount of sellable cards on your board when this triggers, it will instead force you to sell all remaining sellable cards.
    - Weighting of these traps in the trap pool can be configured with the `sell_cards_trap_weighting` option.
  - **Strange Portal Trap** will spawn a strange portal.
      - These portals _cannot_ be used to travel to The Dark Forest.
      - Enemies spawned from these portals will not trigger Mobsanity checks when killed.
      - Weighting of these traps in the trap pool can be configured with the `strange_portal_trap_weighting` option.

### UI Updates
- Archipelago server connection status will now show at the top of the screen at all times and will include any connection failure error messages if any.
- **Start New Run** and **Continue Run** options are now disabled while not connected to the archipelago server.
- **Moon Length** option is now disabled and auto-selected based on `moon_length` yaml option.
- **Peaceful Mode** option is disabled as it is currently not supported.

### Other Updates
- Mod now checks to ensure that the `.apworld` file version is the expected version. If not, it will fail to connect and display an error message informing you.
- `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net` updated to `v6.6.1`

### Fixes
- Fixes an issue causing **Mobsanity** checks to not be checked on completion.
- Potential fix for #57 with changes to when GUI elements are created and modified in an attempt to prevent crashes on boot.
v0.1.6-alphar2.title: v0.1.6-alpha

v0.2.0-alpha.description:
# THIS VERSION HAS BEEN HOTFIXED - 3RD SEPTEMBER 2025
This version previously had a bug that prevented players receiving `Idea: Charcoal` which also caused item sync issues with the server. If you installed `v0.2.0-alpha` on or before 3rd September 2025, please replace your mod install with the [StacklandsRandomizer.v.0.2.0-hotfix.zip](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/download/v0.2.0-alpha/StacklandsRandomizer.v0.2.0-hotfix.zip) file from this release. This will not affect your current run and should continue working as normal.

## Information
This mod is currently in alpha, so it is possible that it may contain bugs or issues - please familiarise yourself with the [known issues list](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen) before using this mod to see how your experience may be affected and use at your own risk.

If you experience a bug/issue that is _not_ in the list, please raise a new github issue or post it in the [Stacklands Forum in the Archipelago Discord Server](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1151149079238299719)

_**PLEASE NOTE:** To ensure that this mod works as intended, please **only** use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release._

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-mod-to-stacklands)

## Patch Notes
### General
- **The Island** is now supported! 🎉🏝️
- Additional basic, custom quests added for Mainland / Forest / Island to the location check pool to allow for a more generous amount of expansion / filler / trap item slots.
- Deathlink has now moved to the in-game **Mods menu** and can be toggled on and off.
- The `Resource Booster Pack` filler item has now been split into `Mainland Resource Booster Pack` and `Island Resource Booster Pack` items and each will spawn on their respective boards and will give board-specific items.
- The `Board Expansion` item has been split into `Mainland Board Expansion` and `Island Board Expansion` items and will each spawn on their respective boards. The `board_expansion_count` YAML option will generate the count of expansion items for _both boards_.

### APWorld / YAML Updates
- `Goal` option updated to include **Kill the Demon Lord** into the goal. 
  - Selected goals (Kill the Demon / Fight the Wicked Witch / Kill the Demon Lord) will automatically include all quests from their respective boards as location checks.
- `Equipmentsanity` option adds location checks for crafting each individual `equipment` card. _(E.g. Club, Iron Shield, Blunderbuss etc.)_
- `Foodsanity` option adds location checks for cooking each individual `food` card. _(E.g. Stew, Fruit Salad, Tamago Sushi etc.)_
- `Locationsanity` option adds location checks for exploring each individual `food` card. _(E.g. Old Village, Plains, Jungle etc.)_
- `Structuresanity` option adds location checks for building each individual `structure` card. _(E.g. Garden, Market, Distillery etc.)_
- `Mobsanity Balancing` option to greatly increase chance of spawning un-killed Mobs from **Booster Packs / Strange Portals / Dark Forest Waves** - this helps prevent having to rely on RNGesus to spawn all mob types to reach all `Mobsanity` checks.

### UI / QoL Updates
- New setting in Mods menu to toggle **Deathlink**.
- New setting in Mods menu to toggle **auto-connect** to the archipelago server on game boot.
- New setting in Mods Options to **hide all completed checks** from the quest log.

### Other Updates
- Access rules completely re-written for _(hopefully)_ better item spread and balance across the spheres and also to help increase chances of receiving weapons earlier to help fend off strange portal waves.
- Supports `Archipelago v0.6.3` for seed generation.

### Fixes
- Fixed #63 - Seed generation should no longer struggle to 'progression balance' items.
- Fixed #64 - Mobsanity mobs from un-selected boards should no longer appear as checks.
- Some additional preventative measures to stop `Feed Villagers Trap` and `Sell Cards Trap` from being triggered while in The Dark Forest.
v0.2.0-alpha.title: v0.2.0-alpha

v0.2.1-alpha.description:
# THIS VERSION HAS BEEN [HOTFIXED](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/tag/v0.2.1-alpha-hotfix) - 3rd September 2025
This version has a bug that prevented players receiving `Idea: Charcoal` which also caused item sync issues with the server. If you installed `v0.2.1-alpha` on or before 3rd September 2025, please replace your install with [v0.2.1-alpha-hotfix](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/tag/v0.2.1-alpha-hotfix) - this will not affect your current run and should continue working as normal.

If you are planning on installing this version, please install the hotfixed version instead.

## Information
This mod is currently in alpha, so it is possible that it may contain bugs or issues - please familiarise yourself with the [known issues list](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen) before using this mod to see how your experience may be affected and use at your own risk.

If you experience a bug/issue that is _not_ in the list, please raise a new github issue or post it in the [Stacklands Forum in the Archipelago Discord Server](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1151149079238299719)

_**PLEASE NOTE:** To ensure that this mod works as intended, please **only** use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release._

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-mod-to-stacklands)

## Patch Notes
### General
- Certain checks (quests) have been adjusted from vanilla to require the item to be **_crafted_** for the check to complete, rather than completing when finding the item from Pack / Treasure Chest / Travelling Merchant / Mob drop RNG:
  - `Cook Raw Meat`
  - `Cook an Omelette`
  - `Cook a Frittata`
  - `Get an Iron Bar`

### APWorld / YAML Updates
- **Boards** option added to select which boards should be included in the run so that boards are no longer determined by the **Goal** option
- **Goal** option changed to now have two options:
  - `all_bosses`: Kill all bosses for all boards selected in the **Boards** option
  - `random_boss`: Select a random boss from the boards selected in the **Boards** option
  - This also opens up potential for different goal types to be added in future...
- Additional quests have been added to **Structuresanity**
- YAML options are now grouped for slightly easier navigation

### Fixes
- Fixed #65 - **Trap Slime** mobs that spawn from **Trap Strange Portal** should no longer spawn normal **Small Slime** and now spawn **Trap Small Slime** instead.
- Fixed #66 - Mobs that spawn from **Mob Trap** or **Trap Strange Portal** should no longer drop items.
- Fixed #67 - The `Have 3 Houses` access rule now correctly requires `Idea: House` to become reachable.
- Fixed #68 - `Build a Shell Quest` should now trigger correctly on completion.
- Fixed #69 _(nice)_ - Access rules that require `Idea: Smithy` _(such as `Make a Magic Ring`)_ now correctly require the ability to create iron bars as well.
- Fixed #70 - Items specific to **-sanity** options are now only classed as `progression` if its respective sanity option is enabled, otherwise it will be classed as either `filler` or `useful`.
v0.2.1-alpha.title: v0.2.1-alpha

v0.2.1-alpha-hotfix.description:
## Information
This release is a hotfix for an issue in [v0.2.1-alpha](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/tag/v0.2.1-alpha) that prevented players receiving `Idea: Charcoal` which also caused item sync issues when trying to sync items from the server.

If you have `v0.2.1-alpha` installed, please replace your install with this version - it will not cause any run save loss.

For all other `v0.2.1-alpha` release notes, please see the [v0.2.1-alpha release notes](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/releases/tag/v0.2.1-alpha)
v0.2.1-alpha-hotfix.title: v0.2.1-alpha-hotfix

v0.2.2-alpha.description:
## Information
This mod is currently in alpha, so it is possible that it may contain bugs or issues - please familiarise yourself with the [known issues list](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen) before using this mod to see how your experience may be affected and use at your own risk.

If you experience a bug/issue that is _not_ in the list, please raise a new github issue or post it in the [Stacklands Forum in the Archipelago Discord Server](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1151149079238299719)

_**PLEASE NOTE:** To ensure that this mod works as intended, please **only** use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release._

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-mod-to-stacklands)

## Patch Notes
### UI / QoL
- Quest(s) for the run's `Goal` are now displayed in their own category at the top of the in-game quest log for better visibility. - **(Addresses #76)**

### APWorld / YAML
- Fixes an issue that caused `Random Boss` goal option to be able to select a goal for boards that were not selected in the `Boards` option, which then caused the **Send Goal** button to not work, as it was expecting an unreachable quest to be completed. - **(Fixes #75)**
v0.2.2-alpha.title: v0.2.2-alpha

v0.2.3-alpha.description:
## Information
This mod is currently in alpha, so it is possible that it may contain bugs or issues - please familiarise yourself with the [known issues list](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen) before using this mod to see how your experience may be affected and use at your own risk.

If you experience a bug/issue that is _not_ in the list, please raise a new github issue or post it in the [Stacklands Forum in the Archipelago Discord Server](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1151149079238299719)

_**PLEASE NOTE:** To ensure that this mod works as intended, please **only** use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release._

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-mod-to-stacklands)

## Patch Notes
### Mod Fixes
- Fixed #78 to ensure **Goal Completed** message appears when all goal quests completed to instruct players how to manually trigger goal completion. _(Which is currently a temporary solution while attempting to fix Issue #6)_

### APWorld Fixes
- Fixed a logic issue causing `Get a Second Villager` to appear in Sphere 1 when it's not achievable.
- Fixed an error causing default options values to not parse correctly when enum options have been omitted from the YAML.
- Fixed #80 to tweak default `Board Expansion Amount` and `Board Expansion Count` options values to provide a default card limit cap of 100 for a more balanced play-through.
  - Added `NOTE` text to option description to highlight the implication of decreasing the values.
  - The `Board Expansion Mode` option default has been set to `Vanilla`.
v0.2.3-alpha.title: v0.2.3-alpha

v0.2.4-alpha.description:
## Information
This mod is currently in alpha, so it is possible that it may contain bugs or issues - please familiarise yourself with the [known issues list](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen) before using this mod to see how your experience may be affected and use at your own risk.

If you experience a bug/issue that is _not_ in the list, please raise a new github issue or post it in the [Stacklands Forum in the Archipelago Discord Server](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1151149079238299719)

_**PLEASE NOTE:** To ensure that this mod works as intended, please **only** use the provided `.apworld`, `.yaml` and `.zip` files together in this release._

## How to Install / Use the Mod
All instructions for how to install and use the mod are in the [README.md](https://github.com/JammyGeeza/Stacklands-Randomizer?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-mod-to-stacklands)

## Patch Notes
### Updates
- #79 Added a QoL `red_structure_spawn_location` YAML option to select where Red Structures _(Portals / Ships)_ will spawn on the board.
- #90 Checks that are collected by other worlds _(such as releasing after a goal)_ will now update the in-game quest log.

### Fixes
- #88 `Cook a Stew` quest naming mismatch fixed.
- #87 `Reach Moon 36` will no longer trigger when you reach Moon 30.
- #86 `PRIORITY` checks returned to `DEFAULT` as no longer required and should prevent multi-world generation issues with Cave Story.
- #84 `board_expansion_mode` being set to `vanilla` should no longer add board expansion items to the pool.
v0.2.4-alpha.title: v0.2.4-alpha
